title: SSLV3_ALERT_HANDSHAKE_FAILURE when trying to download a https url
body:
I was thinking to recommend using datalad special remote as a workaround for a shortcoming in git-annex in  https://github.com/CONP-PCNO/conp-dataset/pull/14#issuecomment-481353966  , and it seemed to work on my laptop but failed to work on smaug:
```
$> datalad download-url https://datahub-khvul4ng.udes.genap.ca/ALL.chr10.phase3_shapeit2_mvncall_integrated_v5a.20130502.genotypes.vcf.gz
[INFO   ] Downloading 'https://datahub-khvul4ng.udes.genap.ca/ALL.chr10.phase3_shapeit2_mvncall_integrated_v5a.20130502.genotypes.vcf.gz' into '/tmp/test-conp' 
download_url(error): /tmp/test-conp (file) [Failed to establish a new session 1 times. Last exception was: [SSL: SSLV3_ALERT_HANDSHAKE_FAILURE] sslv3 alert handshake failure (_ssl.c:720) [adapters.py:send:433] [http.py:get_downloader_session:502]]
```

<details>
<summary>local wtf</summary>

# WTF
- path: /tmp/testds
- type: dataset
- logger: <Logger datalad.plugin.wtf (INFO)>
## configuration <SENSITIVE, report disabled by configuration>
## datalad

## dataset

  - repo: AnnexRepo
## dependencies

  - humanize: 0.5.1

  - keyring: 17.1.1
  - keyrings.alt: 3.1.1

  - mutagen: 1.40.0
  - requests: 2.20.0
  - six: 1.12.0
  - tqdm: 4.28.1
  - wrapt: 1.10.11
## environment 
  - GIT_PAGER: less --no-init --quit-if-one-screen
  - GIT_PYTHON_GIT_EXECUTABLE: /usr/lib/git-annex.linux/git
  - LANG: en_US.utf8
  - PATH: /home/yoh/gocode/bin:/home/yoh/gocode/bin:/home/yoh/bin:/home/yoh/.local/bin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/bin:/usr/local/games:/usr/games:/snap/bin:/sbin:/usr/sbin:/usr/local/sbin
## extentions 
  - container: 
    - description: Containerized environments
